name: Matt Leon
cooked: Approach s2, corresponding to the descriptor changes document linked by @sipa above, seems straightforward to implement and very simple to explain. Yes, it comes at the expense of having to include some extra information in the descriptor. This seems like a worthwhile tradeoff given its simplicity.
